nodes.text: The Ramordia system was located in the Majoor sector, a part of the Trailing Sectors portion of the Expansion Region. It was situated on the super-hyperroute known as the Hydian Way, specifically the section charted by the explorer Freia Kallea between 3703 BBY and 3702 BBY. The hyperspace route connected the system to the Majoor system as well as the Arrgaw system in the Kira sector. The Ramordia system was the origin point of the material known as Ramordian silk.
The Ramordia system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square N-15.
